items.title: Jeff Bezos is reportedly courting Trump after public spat with Musk
items.description: Bezos allegedly sees an opening for his space company, Blue Origin, now that Musk has been diminished in the eyes of the President.

items.title: People use AI for companionship much less than we’re led to think
items.description: A report by Anthropic reveals that people rarely seek companionship from AI, and turn to AI for emotional support or advice only 2.9% of the time.

items.title: YouTube adds an AI Overviews-like search results carousel
items.description: YouTube is rolling out new AI-powered features to help users find content and information more easily, the company announced on Thursday.

items.title: Jon McNeill brings the operator’s playbook to TechCrunch All Stage
items.description: Founders are often told to chase product-market fit before anything else, but what if scaling too soon, too fast, is what’s really holding them back? ...

items.title: Meta’s recruiting blitz claims three OpenAI researchers
